verses.name: Matthew 7:13
verses.text: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:

verses.name: Matthew 7:14
verses.text: Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.

verses.name: Matthew 7:15
verses.text: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep’s clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.

verses.name: Matthew 7:16
verses.text: Ye shall know them by their fruits. Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?
